title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: download, build and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a single CLI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat & embed from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models via simple API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in chains.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for chatting with Ollama models in the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, pull models in Ruby apps.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that talks to Ollama over the REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama server (CPU & GPU) with docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js REST proxy that adds JWT auth & rate-limiting in front of Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that wraps Ollama for multi-user chat with token quotas.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JS/TS bindings for the Ollama local LLM server.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package: Python client for chatting and embedding with Ollama.
